Competences.Competence: To be ready to integrate the community of professionals in web

Content.Text:
What to create

  • Report
  • Sharing session

 

Description

The student should dedicate time to engage in different activities that have the potential to strengthen their participation in the web industry.

 

Group arrangement

This work must be done individually.

 

Minimum requirements

  • The report to be created (e.g. a spreadsheet) should contain a shot description of each activity, the amount of hours spent and links to supporting documents (certificates, emails, project attributions, etc)
  • A total of 40h should be spent in the activities throughout the entire length of the course, with no constraint on when they should be done (i.e. the student decides on  when to do each activities)
  • Even though itâ€™s not a problem to spend more than that amount of time in a certain activity, no activity should account for more than 10h in the report

 

Deliverables

  • Private link to report file

 

Theme ideas

  • Participating in open source projects
    • Creating software
    • Contributing to existing projects
  • Answering front-end development-related question on websites such as Stack Overflow and Quora
  • Helping out on the organization web-related events
  • Organizing web-related events
  • Participating on web-related events

Competences.Competence: To be ready to integrate the community of professionals in web
